samples.question: What is your favorite hobby and how often do you do it?
samples.transcript: My favorite hobby, I would have to say in the summertime would definitely be golfing. I love getting out on the golf course. it is beautiful out there, very relaxing. it is it is great to do. In the winter time, I would say snowboarding would be my favorite. I do not get out as much as I would like to, but it is one of my favorite things to do. Okay.

It's uh beautiful out there, very relaxing. It's uh it's great to do. In the winter time, I'd say snowboarding would be my favorite. Um, I don't get out as much as I'd like to, but uh, it's one of my favorite things to do. Okay.

samples.question: Have your hobbies changed since, childhood?

samples.question: How do you think they have changed?

So, I I think just getting older, maturing has changed them for the most part.

samples.question: Do you think people today are less willing to help others compared to maybe people in the past?

I think that should change. But going back to your question, yes, I do think it is different from the past from now.

samples.question: Do you think childhood or adulthood is more boring?
samples.transcript: I personally think childhood is more boring and as per my experience I was very I think my past experience was very bored in my childhood because at that time I did not have a lot of freedom you know but after I become an adulthood I you know I can meet my friend and drink some alcohol and going to party yeah I can join those activities so I guess child rather than childhood adulthood is more exciting Okay, I see.

samples.question: What do you do when you feel bored?

samples.question: So do you ever think that AI will replace human teachers?

So I think it could not be changed by AI or robotic mechanism something. Okay.

samples.question: What household appliances can make us lazy?
samples.transcript: It is very funny question but I personally think robotic robotic you know vacuum cleaner they they makes us more lazier than before because now we do not have to use our own vacuum cleaner to clean our house. However, we use some remote controller to use our robotic machine. Then they can go crawler to the blower and yeah clean our dust or something on the floor. So I think it makes us more lazier than before.
